Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: masturbation \mas`tur*ba"tion\, n. [L. masturbatus, p. p. of masturbari to practice onanism: cf. F. masturbation.] The act of masturbating; sexual self-gratification; onanism. [1913 Webster]
masturbation n : manual stimulation of the genital organs (of yourself or another) for sexual pleasure [syn: {onanism}, {self-abuse}]
